Fight-Do.name: Fight-Do
Fight-Do.description: Fight-Do is a high-energy group fitness workout that combines elements of martial arts, boxing, and aerobic exercises. It improves cardiovascular fitness, strength, and coordination.

Yoga.name: Yoga
Yoga.description: Yoga blends stretching and strengthening through elegant poses, enhancing physical strength, flexibility, and nurturing a sense of balance and serenity.

Line Dance.name: Line Dance
Line Dance.description: Line dance is a choreographed group dance where participants perform a sequence of steps in a synchronized manner. It promotes coordination and provides a fun way to stay active.

Active Family.name: Active Family
Active Family.description: Active Family promotes physical activity and healthy lifestyle habits among all family members, encouraging exercise and active play together.

Salsation.name: Salsation
Salsation.description: Salsation is a dance fitness program that blends functional training protocols with dance moves, emphasizing musicality, lyrical expression, and the body's natural movement.

K-Kardio.name: K-Kardio
K-Kardio.description: K-Kardio Dance is a Kpop workout program that combines Kpop MTV moves with cardio elements, providing an easy and fun way to stay fit.

KpopX Fitness.name: KpopX Fitness
KpopX Fitness.description: KpopX Fitness combines Kpop dance moves with aerobic and body toning exercises for an engaging fitness experience, enhancing physical fitness and fun.

Zumba.name: Zumba
Zumba.description: Zumba combines low and mid-intensity dance moves in an interval-style, calorie-burning workout inspired by various dance styles like salsa, hip-hop, and mambo.

Piloxing.name: Piloxing
Piloxing.description: Piloxing is a fusion of boxing and standing Pilates, combining cardiovascular training, balance, and muscle strengthening.

Kickboxing.name: Kickboxing
Kickboxing.description: Kickboxing is a martial art that combines elements of boxing with kicks, providing a full-body workout that improves strength, endurance, and coordination.

Quick HIIT.name: Quick HIIT
Quick HIIT.description: Quick HIIT offers the benefits of traditional HIIT in a shorter time frame, alternating between high-intensity activity and rest to provide an effective, full-body workout.
